name: Config 2022 Name Card - Alejandro de Francisco
description:
WHAT I DO

I work with a diverse range of companies, brands and partners across multiple platforms, specialising in UX/UI, creative direction and brand identity.


WHAT I DONâ€™T

Sleep well. Drink patxaran. Call home enough. Keep receipts. Tread carefully in the rain. Dream much. Wash whites and colours separate. Allow 30 minutes after eating before swimming. Go to galleries often enough. Smoke. Ever regret hot spicy food. Visit the dentist regularly.
